TopicTitle: A mod to change the ambiance light in the VAB?

Articles.Content:
Greetings,

Is there any mod the allows to change the light source on the VAB for testing lights in my rockets? Something like to dim the lights of the VAB or off/on for example?

Thank you.

Welcome to the forum!

There is a mod that does this, but...I'm sorry to say I don't remeber its name. A forum search should turn it up though.
Found it. Dunno if it works in .24 though.

It does but it's a little finicky the way it works. It's one of those brilliant but hackish mods. Basically what it does is it removes VAB, because technically the VAB doesn't have lights it just has the illusion of lights. The problem comes when you want to turn the lights back on you need to make sure you save the craft first. The reason is that to restore the lights it simply reloads the scene and the craft, so if you made changes while the lights were off, they get lost.

(For any programmers reading this I over simplified on purpose)

Edited September 25, 2014 by Alshain

Thank you for the replies. That looks interesting but it seams the guy never made it better or is just hard to mod. Also I do not want unfinished mods on my ksp (is any mod finished? ). Im running several mods already and its getting almost at the maximum of my ram.

Thank you all.

Fly safe.
